pages.text: The $(mob)Mermaid$() is a monster that spawns in the oceans of the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to drowning, and ranged attacks, can move through water unimpeded, and is resistant to Fire. While in water, it gains a $(thing)Resistance$() effect and restores 10% of its health every 5 seconds. $(mob)Mermaids$() are passive until provoked, at which point it attacks with melee strikes which apply $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() and $(thing)Slowness$() effects.

$(mob)Mimics$() drop $(item)Monster Feed$() on death. This item can be used to tame any helper mobs from $(thing)Grimoire of Gaia$(). When tamed, they will behave like a vanilla $(l:minecraft_iron_golem)$(mob)Golem$().

$(mob)Mimics$() drop $(item)Book of Hunger$() on death, which inflicts $(thing)Hunger on foes upon a melee strike. Additionally,  $(mob)Mimics$() may drop any item which a basic $(thing)Minecraft$() creature could drop on death.
